paper_info.author: Vivek Nigam, Carlos Olarte, and Elaine Pimentel.
paper_info.title: On subexponentials, focusing and modalities in concurrent systems
paper_info.citation:
Vivek Nigam, Carlos Olarte, and Elaine Pimentel. On subexponentials, focusing and modalities in concurrent systems. Theor. Comput. Sci., 693:35–58, 2017.
This extends our CONCUR 2013 paper.
